00230 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00231 
00232 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00233 l4_factory_create_task_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory,
00234                          l4_cap_idx_t target_cap, l4_fpage_t utcb_area,
00235                          l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00236 {
00237   l4_msgtag_t t;
00238   t = l4_factory_create_start_u(L4_PROTO_TASK, target_cap, u);
00239   l4_factory_create_add_fpage_u(utcb_area, &t, u);
00240   return l4_factory_create_commit_u(factory, t, u);
00241 }
00242 
00243 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00244 l4_factory_create_thread_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory,
00245                            l4_cap_idx_t target_cap, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00246 {
00247   l4_msgtag_t t = l4_factory_create_start_u(L4_PROTO_THREAD, target_cap, u);
00248   return l4_factory_create_commit_u(factory, t, u);
00249 }
00250 
00251 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00252 l4_factory_create_factory_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory,
00253                             l4_cap_idx_t target_cap, unsigned long limit,
00254                             l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00255 {
00256   l4_msgtag_t t;
00257   t = l4_factory_create_start_u(L4_PROTO_FACTORY, target_cap, u);
00258   l4_factory_create_add_uint_u(limit, &t, u);
00259   return l4_factory_create_commit_u(factory, t, u);
00260 }
00261 
00262 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00263 l4_factory_create_gate_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory,
00264                          l4_cap_idx_t target_cap,
00265                          l4_cap_idx_t thread_cap, l4_umword_t label,
00266                          l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00267 {
00268   l4_msgtag_t t;
00269   l4_msg_regs_t *v;
00270   int items = 0;
00271   t = l4_factory_create_start_u(0, target_cap, u);
00272   l4_factory_create_add_uint_u(label, &t, u);
00273   v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00274   if (!(thread_cap & L4_INVALID_CAP_BIT))
00275     {
00276       items = 1;
00277       v->mr[3] = l4_map_obj_control(0,0);
00278       v->mr[4] = l4_obj_fpage(thread_cap, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00279     }
00280   t = l4_msgtag(l4_msgtag_label(t), l4_msgtag_words(t), items, l4_msgtag_flags(t));
00281   return l4_factory_create_commit_u(factory, t, u);
00282 }
00283 
00284 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00285 l4_factory_create_irq_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory,
00286                         l4_cap_idx_t target_cap, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00287 {
00288   l4_msgtag_t t = l4_factory_create_start_u(L4_PROTO_IRQ, target_cap, u);
00289   return l4_factory_create_commit_u(factory, t, u);
00290 }

00349 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00350 l4_factory_create_start_u(long obj, l4_cap_idx_t target_cap,
00351                           l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00352 {
00353   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00354   l4_buf_regs_t *b = l4_utcb_br_u(u);
00355   v->mr[0] = obj;
00356   b->bdr = 0;
00357   b->br[0] = target_cap | L4_RCV_ITEM_SINGLE_CAP;
00358   return l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_FACTORY, 1, 0, 0);
00359 }
00360 
00361 L4_INLINE int
00362 l4_factory_create_add_fpage_u(l4_fpage_t d, l4_msgtag_t *tag,
00363                               l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00364 {
00365   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00366   int w = l4_msgtag_words(*tag);
00367   if (w + 2 > L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE)
00368     return 0;
00369   v->mr[w] = L4_VARG_TYPE_FPAGE | (sizeof(l4_fpage_t) << 16);
00370   v->mr[w + 1] = d.raw;
00371   w += 2;
00372   tag->raw = (tag->raw & ~0x3fUL) | (w & 0x3f);
00373   return 1;
00374 }
00375 
00376 L4_INLINE int
00377 l4_factory_create_add_int_u(l4_mword_t d, l4_msgtag_t *tag,
00378                             l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00379 {
00380   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00381   int w = l4_msgtag_words(*tag);
00382   if (w + 2 > L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE)
00383     return 0;
00384   v->mr[w] = L4_VARG_TYPE_MWORD | (sizeof(l4_mword_t) << 16);
00385   v->mr[w + 1] = d;
00386   w += 2;
00387   tag->raw = (tag->raw & ~0x3fUL) | (w & 0x3f);
00388   return 1;
00389 }
00390 
00391 L4_INLINE int
00392 l4_factory_create_add_uint_u(l4_umword_t d, l4_msgtag_t *tag,
00393                              l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00394 {
00395   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00396   int w = l4_msgtag_words(*tag);
00397   if (w + 2 > L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE)
00398     return 0;
00399   v->mr[w] = L4_VARG_TYPE_UMWORD | (sizeof(l4_umword_t) << 16);
00400   v->mr[w + 1] = d;
00401   w += 2;
00402   tag->raw = (tag->raw & ~0x3fUL) | (w & 0x3f);
00403   return 1;
00404 }
00405 
00406 L4_INLINE int
00407 l4_factory_create_add_str_u(char const *s, l4_msgtag_t *tag,
00408                             l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00409 {
00410   return l4_factory_create_add_lstr_u(s, __builtin_strlen(s), tag, u);
00411 }
00412 
00413 L4_INLINE int
00414 l4_factory_create_add_lstr_u(char const *s, int len, l4_msgtag_t *tag,
00415                              l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00416 {
00417 
00418   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00419   int w = l4_msgtag_words(*tag);
00420   char *c;
00421   int i;
00422 
00423   if (w + 1 + (len + sizeof(l4_umword_t) - 1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t)
00424       > L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE)
00425     return 0;
00426 
00427   v->mr[w] = L4_VARG_TYPE_STRING | (len << 16);
00428   c = (char*)&v->mr[w + 1];
00429   for (i = 0; i < len; ++i)
00430     *c++ = *s++;
00431 
00432   w = w + 1 + (len + sizeof(l4_umword_t) - 1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t);
00433 
00434   tag->raw = (tag->raw & ~0x3fUL) | (w & 0x3f);
00435   return 1;
00436 }
00437 
00438 L4_INLINE int
00439 l4_factory_create_add_nil_u(l4_msgtag_t *tag, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00440 {
00441   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00442   int w = l4_msgtag_words(*tag);
00443   v->mr[w] = L4_VARG_TYPE_NIL;
00444   ++w;
00445   tag->raw = (tag->raw & ~0x3fUL) | (w & 0x3f);
00446   return 1;
00447 }
00448 
00449 
00450 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00451 l4_factory_create_commit_u(l4_cap_idx_t factory, l4_msgtag_t tag,
00452                            l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00453 {
00454   return l4_ipc_call(factory, u, tag, L4_IPC_NEVER);
00455 }
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
